headline: Apollo Global Management (APO) Explores Potential Sale of Aviation Company, Atlas Air Worldwide Holdings Inc., Reports Bloomberg
summary: Apollo Global Management, Inc. (NYSE:APO) is one of the High Growth Large Cap Stocks to Buy Right Now. On December 16, Bloomberg reported that Apollo Global Management, Inc. (NYSE:APO) has been exploring a potential sale of its aviation company, Atlas Air Worldwide Holdings Inc. The investment firm happens to be in early stages of considering a potential […]
